humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 4 lymph nodes were examined and no metastatic carcinoma was identified in any of them (0 nodes with macrometastases, micrometastases, or isolated tumor cells). This matches the criteria for N0 as per the new rules 10, 11, and the original rule 2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that a total of 4 lymph nodes were examined, with 3 sentinel lymph nodes and 1 non-sentinel lymph node. None of these lymph nodes contained macrometastases (>0.2 cm), micrometastases (>0.2 mm to 0.2 cm and/or >200 cells), or isolated tumor cells (0.2 mm and 200 cells). Therefore, the patient's N stage is N0.
